play/index.html/old-browser-msg.title.description: This is the heading for a notice that tells users on older browsers that they can't run the game

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.close-tag.message: DRAMA: <{{closeTag.name}}> tags don't have closing tags, so this </{{closeTag.name}}> isn't needed.

app/errors.music-not-found.message: Oh no! We couldn't load the music!

app/errors.code-errors.message: There are errors in your code! Fix them before saving.

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.untermina.message: Oh, what!? You need to add a > to this closing </{{closeTag.name}}> tag.
This comment should end with a -->.

app/loader.messages.21.message: Haggling over the price of kittens...

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.invalid-c.message: Hey! There's no such thing as {{cssProperty.property}}. The CSS gods decided it wasn't meant to be. Or perhaps you spelled it wrong...

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.uncaught-.message: Something's gone terribly wrong. You probably don't know what, and neither do we, but we found this at the scene of the crime: {{error.msg}}.

app/cutscene.error.message: Oh no! We couldn't load that cutscene...

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.html-code.message: EWWWW!!! You've got HTML in your CSS! It doesn't belong there...

play/index.html/menu.cancel.description: Button on the bar at the top of the screen during levels. Closes the edit view, discarding the code the user entered

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.untermina.message: FYI, you need to add a > to the end of this opening </{{openTag.name}}> tag.

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.unexpecte.message: Watch out! You've got a closing (end) </{{closeTag.name}}> tag, but no opening (start) tag to go with it.

app/errors.sound-not-found.message: Oh no! We couldn't load the sound!

app/loader.messages.19.message: Kitten gifs intercepted by the NSA...

play/index.html/about.instructions.message: Usa las teclas <kbd>A</kbd> y <kbd>D</kbd> o <kbd>←</kbd> y <kbd>→</kbd> para moverte a la izquiera y derecha. Usa <kbd>W</kbd>, <kbd>espacio</kbd>, o <kbd>↑</kbd> para brincar.

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.missing-c.message: You need to add a value after {{cssProperty.property}}:!
You need to finish this {{cssSelector.selector}} CSS block with a } after {{cssValue.value}};

play/index.html/old-browser-msg.html.message: Unfortunately, your browser doesn't support everything we need for E.A.K. to run well. You seem to be missing:
play/index.html/old-browser-msg.html.description: Prompt users on old browsers to upgrade to a newer one

play/index.html/menu.edit.description: Button on the bar at the top of the screen during levels. Opens up the edit view.

play/index.html/menu.redo.description: Redo button for the code editor

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.lonely-an.message: This lonely < looks like the start of a tag. It doesn't work on its own - delete it, or add the tag name and closing >.

play/index.html/about.description.message: Erase All Kittens (Elimina a Todos los Gatitos) es una plataforma de juego con una diferencia: Los niveles del juego están escritos en HTML y CSS, y la única manera de avanzar es usando tus habilidades de programación para "hackear" el nivel siguiente.
play/index.html/about.description.description: a short description of the game

app/loader.messages.3.message: Are you having a nice day?

play/index.html/menu.undo.description: Undo button for the code editor

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.unfinishe.message: Oops! Finish your value {{cssValue.value}} with a ;.

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.unclosed-.message: Oh no! This <{{openTag.name}}> needs a closing </{{openTag.name}}> tag.

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.unfinishe.message: {{cssProperty.property}} isn't finished! You need a : after the property's name.

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.invalid-t.message: There's no such thing as a <{{openTag.name}}> tag. The masters of HTML wouldn't allow it.

app/errors.load-sprite.message: Oh no! We couldn't load the animations!

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.forbid-JS.message: Sorry! You can't use JavaScript in E.A.K. (yet). So don't. The JavaScript police will get you with their sharp pointy teeth!

play/index.html/old-browser-msg.ignore.message: You can ignore this message and continue anyway, but things are likely to be broken or not work at all. E.A.K. runs best in the latest Firefox or Chrome.
play/index.html/old-browser-msg.ignore.description: Users of old browsers can continue anyway, but we'd rather they upgraded

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.unquoted-.message: You need a " after the = on this {{attribute.name.value}} attribute. Just saying.

play/index.html/menu.reset.description: Button on the bar at the top of the screen during levels. When in the edit view, this sets the code to how it was at the start of the level

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.self-clos.message: OI! You can't have a / at the end of this opening <{{name}}>. It has to go in a closing </{{name}}> tag.

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.unfinishe.message: This selector {{cssSelector.selector}} should end with a {.

app/loader.messages.1.message: These are some pretty heavy kittens...

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.missing-c.message: This {{cssSelector.selector}} is empty! It needs a property.

app/loader.messages.17.message: Time for a cup of tea...

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.missing-c.message: You need to finish your CSS with a </style> tag!

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.untermina.message: You need to finish this CSS comment with a */! DO IT!

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.invalid-a.message: There's no such thing as a {{attribute.name.value}} attribute. The masters of HTML wouldn't allow it.

play/index.html/todo.description: for when I've not done stuff yet ;)

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.untermina.message: You need to add a " at the end of this <{{openTag.name}}> tag's {{attribute.name.value}} attribute. Crazy, right?

app/errors.level-errors.message: There are errors in that level!

play/index.html/language.description: The name of the language you're translating to, in that language.

play/index.html/menu.save.description: Button on the bar at the top of the screen during levels. Closes the edit view, keeping the code the user entered

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.attribute.message: I thought you should know, you can't put an attribute in this closing </{{closeTag.name}}> tag.

play/index.html/menu.restart.description: Button on the bar at the top of the screen during levels. Puts the level and player back in the starting state.

play/index.html/title.message: Erase All Kittens (Elimina a Todos los Gatitos)

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.mismatche.message: These tags don't match! You've got a closing </{{closeTag.name}}> tag, but it's trying to pair with the opening <{{openTag.name}}>.

app/settings.language-warn.message: If you change language, you'll lose any progress you made on your current level. Are you sure you want to continue?
app/settings.language-warn.description: Language change warning in settings page
